snippet: In New Orleans, the Friday fish fry during Lent has become a major event, drawing crowds as parish kitchens stretch their culinary skills and other organizations join the party.
abstract: Friday fish fry during Lent has become a major event in New Orleans, with different kitchens using the occasion as a chance to stretch their culinary skills and throw the sort of neighborhood parties the city is known for.
lead_paragraph: In New Orleans, the Friday fish fry during Lent has become a major event, drawing crowds as parish kitchens stretch their culinary skills and other organizations join the party.

headline.seo: New Orleans Turns Lent Fish Fry Into Culinary Event
headline.main: On Lenten Fridays in New Orleans, the Catfish Are Making the Sacrifices
headline.print_headline: On Lenten Fridays in New Orleans, the Catfish Are Making the Sacrifices
